text:
There won't be separate "Enablement Package" in WSUS both Windows 11 21H2 / 22H2
will get: Windows 11, version 23H2 x64 2023-10B, which is UUP, each version will
install the needed files for 21H2, it's full upgrade + LCU + EKB via UUP for
22H2, it's update LCU + EKB via UUP p.s. Windows 11 version 23H2 Enablement
Package (KB5027397)
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcatalog.sf.dl.delivery.mp.microsoft.com%2Ffilestreamingservice%2Ffiles%2Fcaa3ff4a-6420-4341-aeae-33b2d7f463be%2Fpublic%2Fwindows11.0-kb5027397-x64_3a9c368e239bb928c32a790cf1663338d2cad472.msu&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cc68c44e0b73d4147b45908dbdb0e2c06%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638344626140828852%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=iYqlh944lI4UQf6JdZkG3mEklie3DHdTuRe2l49peIM%3D&reserved=0
